title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Weddings
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Weddings                Weddings         Wedding at Camp Greentop in Catoctin Mountain Park. NPS Photo  Catoctin Mountain Park provides a beautiful setting for weddings. A Special Use Permit is required to hold a wedding in Catoctin Mountain Park, regardless of group size. The application fee is $100. Complete the form below to apply and mail to the address listed on the form.   Application for Special Use Permit -NPS form 10-930.(pdf 298kb)   Information about facility rental fees and season dates.   See the photo gallery below for photos of some weddings that have taken place at Camp Greentop in Catoctin Mountain Park.  Â                 Weddings at Catoctin Mountain Park   23 Photos  Weddings at Catoctin Mountain Park. See http://www.nps.gov/cato/planyourvisit/weddings.htm
